Package entities

Class Relation

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.Relation
  • public class Relation
extends Object
    A relation is an arraylist of tuples with a common list of attributes The schema of the relation specifies those attributes The relation is empty upon construction
    Author:
    Nikolaos Tziavelis
